about_the_game:
Do you want to take out your aggressions after a hard work day or school? if yes, this is the game for you.You basically play "Rage room" but with a twist that you need for managing a YouTube channel for earning money for the sake of keeping breaking things.

Break stuff:
Feel free to break a variety of objects from the shop in a variety of ways: crash, burn, shot, throw, explode and more!.

Manage your channel and your finances:
To continue to keep breaking things you need money, and you can earn money in two ways: the first way is working for minimum wage, or try the fun way, start successful channel and entertain your audience by breaking stuff.

Get comment from real youtubers:
Get real comment from real youtubers on your videos. big youtubers like: SEROTHS, TheNorthernAlex, Juniorsky and more youtubers!.

Get comment from AI:
Get comments from trained AI on thousands of YouTube comments.

name: BreakTube

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: I5 7500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
